title: Badgering the Waitress
description: Max says if he needs a server's attention, he's within his rights to flag someone down - but his friend Andy says he's going about it all wrong. Who's right?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
content:encoded: Max says if he needs a server's attention, he's within his rights to flag someone down - but his friend Andy says he's going about it all wrong. Who's right?
